The report includes several photos of a: taken on February 26, 2020, by the Associated Press and Reuters.
The article is headlined: Vatican confirms Pope Francis and two aides test positive for Coronavirus."
The Vatican spokesman: Matteo Bruni, issued a statement denying the claim and stating that the pope's cold was running its course without symptoms of other pathologies.
The website: Make Comments Meaningful," which published the report, is not a legitimate news site and lacks clear sources and contact information.
